funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by grants from the Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (SIDA) (Grant no. SWE-2100-016) and the Swedish Research Council (Grant no. 2013-06257). The grants were awarded to M. Evander, R. Sang and C. Ahlm. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
